channel.title: Artificial Intelligence on Portfolio
channel.description: Recent content in Artificial Intelligence on Portfolio

item.title: Mask Detection and Segmentation
item.description: This is an Artificial Intelligence Project created to detect whether a person is wearing a Mask or not, besides, using segmentation the model detect the borders of the mask. The model used for Mask Detection was the Resnet50 and for Mask Segmentation was Coco.
